# Delete an attachment

This task explains how to delete an attachment.

Complete the following steps to delete an attachment:

1.  On the detail page of the target object, scroll down to the Attachments section.
2.  Find the target attachment you want to delete by the title.
3.  Click the action menu bar and click Delete.

    ![delete attachment](https://zuora.deploy.heretto.com/v4/deployments/QPAZk6lsgXwvotedNERE/object/13d358cf-77e1-4213-8eb9-47d15bdd0f19?jwt=eyJ0eXAiOiJKV1QiLCJhbGciOiJIUzI1NiJ9..5KKf8X-cF9y-L48BOQiVOA42XZtqpBsMUGVgDck-poc)

4.  Click OK to confirm the deletion.
